title: Manage Mobile Equipment Fluid Levels
description: A technician at a fuel bay is responsible for checking and topping up the fluids (fuel, oil, coolant) of every haul truck at the end of its shift.

tasks.description: A haul truck (HT-34) pulls into the fuel bay. Scan the equipment ID to bring up its record.
tasks.expected_outcome: The truck's record is displayed on a mobile device.

tasks.description: Refuel the truck and check the levels for engine oil, coolant, and hydraulic fluid.
tasks.expected_outcome: The truck is refueled, and the fluid levels are checked.

tasks.description: Top up the engine oil and record the amount added in the system. Log the service as complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The oil is topped up, and the consumption is logged in the CMMS, which helps track engine health.
